import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import * as data from './landing/POSTS.json' @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'angular'; posts: any = (data as any).default?.articles; }
